CustomField.description: If we do not want to display a record on the front end, this field contains a json string of all of the fields and values we need to populate in order to hide the record.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If we do not want to display a record on the front end, this field contains a json string of all of the fields and values we need to populate in order to hide the record.
CustomField.label: Inactive Record Field Map
